Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Transform UI to Geener branding with modern design

Major updates:
- Complete redesign with Geener branding and black/white theme
- Removed contact form and Lovable references
- Implemented React Router layout with centralized navigation
- Reorganized components into home/ directory structure

New features:
- Black navbar with curved Contact Us button and smooth scroll navigation
- Hero section with multi-line heading and Unsplash image
- Stats section displaying key metrics (2000+ customers, 10+ years, etc.)
- Culture section with team values and alternating image layouts
- Programs section with numbered list and detailed descriptions
- Testimonial carousel with auto-play and manual navigation
- Enhanced CTA section with background image overlay
- Contact page with information cards and "Why Choose Geener" section

Technical improvements:
- Created Layout wrapper for consistent header/footer across pages
- Added section IDs for smooth scroll navigation
- Implemented component-based architecture organized by page
- Updated all styling to match Geener''s professional black/white aesthetic
